question: In December, the MSME ministry launched which of these products produced by women of militancy affected areas of J&K?
explanation: In December, the ministry of micro, small and medium enterprises (MSME) launched ‘Khadi Rumal’ from the militancy affected areas of Jammu and Kashmir. These are handkerchiefs made of khadi cloth and stitched by the women of the affected region. This is an effort to create employment in the region.
